actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase to $110,000 the amount of a borrower's disaster loans eligible for a 3 per centum interest rate.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to increase from $55,000 to $110,000 the amount of a borrower's disaster loan which is eligible for a three percent interest rate, in the case of a disaster occurring on or after January 1, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase to $110,000 the amount of a borrower's disaster loans eligible for a 3 per centum interest rate.
